name: ListGithubRepoContributors
description:
Retrieve contributors for a specific GitHub repository.

This tool lists contributors to a specified GitHub repository, sorted by the number of commits in descending order. It captures contributions by GitHub user, including associated email addresses, but may include anonymous contributors without GitHub user details due to performance optimization limits.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository. This value is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: include_anonymous_contributors
parameters.description: Set to `1` or `true` to include anonymous contributors in the results.

value_schema.description: Set to `1` or `true` to include anonymous contributors in results.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Specifies the page number of contributors to fetch. Use this to navigate through paginated results. Each page contains a subset of contributors, with 'per_page' controlling the number of contributors per page.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: anon
parameters.description: Set to `1` or `true` to include anonymous contributors in results.

value_schema.description: Set to `1` or `true` to include anonymous contributors in results.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
